title: gifted skin not received but rp gone?
body:
Hello,

I gifted my roommate odyssey kayn skin, when I sent it gave me message along lines of "Error during transaction".  The RP was deducted, no skin was received. 

How to I get help with this?

replies.body:
Shit happens, contact support, they will be able to look at transaction log.

Also, relog your client, it may just be a local glitch in your balance or missing skin.
